document_data.mainbody:
The Frostfenn was a large marshland located on the island of Norland within the Moonshae Isles.
The Frostfenn was found in central and northern Norland, wedged between the North Jotunhammer Mountains to the west and open grassland to the east. It was a dominating feature of inner Norland, covering approximately  of the island. Norfen Lake sat along the northeast edge of the Frostfenn.
